name: Red Chess
description:
This is a text based adventure game, where you are an inspiring historian who wants to discover what happened in Stalemate castle, a place where all of its inhabitants suddenly disappeared, the game has multiple endings. 

There might be a secret or two hiding in there. 

Make sure to type "help" to see the list of commands

Commands:

Help | look | walk/move | inventory | take | attack/fight | stats | drink | map | teleport| quit | and some others that are context dependent.

When moving to a new room you can type walk #room (example: walk 1 to go to room one if it's next to the room you are currently in). The same can be done with the items, you can type: take potion to grab that item if there is one in the room.

Good luck and thank you for playing the game.
